name: 陳燦輝
objective:
簡介:

1. 集合，序列與函數 (Set, Sequence, & Functions)
2. 基礎邏輯 (Predicate Logic & Calculus)
3. 關聯式 (Relations)
4. 計數，排列，組合 (Counting Techniques)
5. 遞迴式與演算法 (Recurrence & Algorithms)
6. 圖形理論 (Graphs & Trees)
schedule:
課程進度:
Week Topics
   1    Introduction
   2    Sets, Logic: propositions, conditional propositions and logic equivalence
   3    Logic: arguments and rules of inference, quantifiers
   4    Proofs: direct proofs and counterexamples, proof by contradiction, proofs by
         contrapositive
   5    Proofs: mathematical induction
   6    Functions, Sequences, and Relations
   7    Algorithms_1
   8    Algorithms_2
   9    Mid-term exam
  10   Counting Methods: permutations
  11   Counting Methods:combinations, probability theory and Pigeonhole Principle
  12   Recurrence Relations_1
  13   Recurrence Relations_1
  14   Graphs Theory: paths, cycles, and Euler cycle
  15   Graphs Theory: Hamiltonian cycle, shortest-path algorithm
  16   Tree: Huffman codes, spanning trees
  17   Tree traversals
  18   Final exam
scorePolicy:
20% Attendance and Assignments 
   20% Quizzes
   30% Mid-term Exam
   30% Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: Discrete Mathematics, Eighth Edition, Richard Johnsonbaugh, Prentice Hall, 2019. (華泰)
　　(中譯本) 離散數學，吳世弘 譯，華泰。
